feed.title: Dave’s Tech Ramblings
feed.subtitle: Hi I'm dave albert the CTO of [One15](https://one15.co) . I love all thing dev and ops.

entry.title: Hello World! Moving to Jekyll
entry.content: Thanks to this post I was able to understand how to move from Wordpress (which had a mysql error by the way) in one evening while lying in bed … I should be sleeping now really.
entry.summary: Thanks to this post I was able to understand how to move from Wordpress (which had a mysql error by the way) in one evening while lying in bed … I should be sleeping now really.
